sn18.11:1.3: Atha kho ayasma rahulo yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho ayasmantam rahulam bhagava etadavoca:
sn18.11:1.7: “Yam pananiccam dukkham va tam sukham va”ti?
sn18.11:1.9: “Yam pananiccam dukkham viparinamadhammam, kallam nu tam samanupassitum:
sn18.11:1.18: “Yam pananiccam dukkham va tam sukham va”ti?
sn18.11:1.20: “Yam pananiccam dukkham viparinamadhammam, kallam nu tam samanupassitum:
sn18.11:1.23: “Evam passam, rahula, sutava ariyasavako cakkhusmimpi nibbindati …pe… sotasmimpi nibbindati … ghanasmimpi nibbindati … jivhayapi nibbindati … kayasmimpi nibbindati … manasmimpi nibbindati;
sn18.11:1.24: nibbindam virajjati; viraga vimuccati; vimuttasmim vimuttamiti nanam hoti.
sn18.11:1.25: ‘Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanati”ti.
